text:
Angelina Jolie is melting down, and RadarOnline.com has learned her increasingly bitter divorce and custody battle with Brad Pitt is to blame!

“Brad’s in a far stronger position now he’s scored a greater share of custody, and she’s not handling it well at all,” an insider told RadarOnline.com.

“The stress is all consuming and she’s been skipping meals and losing a lot of sleep.”

As RadarOnline.com reported, Jolie, 43, was dealt a devastating blow recently when a judge in Los Angeles granted Pitt, 54, more time with his younger children — Pax, 14, Zahara, 13, Shiloh, 12, and twins Knox and Vivienne, 9.
title: Stressed Angelina ‘Melting Down’ After Custody War With Brad Explodes!
